record.field: A
This kind of article need a more detailed description of the context in which it will be used.
C
The article is potentially subject to important modifications (supply sources, better alternatives).
E
The article is expensive and its choice should be justified in relation to cheaper alternatives.
F
Monitor the use, efficacy for at least one year after the introduction of new drugs.
M
The article may imply medical risks if misused by persons with insufficient training or knowledge.
ME
The article may imply medical risks if misused by persons with insufficient training, Expensive.
MF
The article may imply medical risks if misused + Monitor the use, efficacy at least one year.
O
The article and its specifications are obsolete or are no longer the international standard.
OM
The article and its specifications are obsolete , it may imply a medical risk if misused.
OP
The article and its specifications are obsolete , it has to be used only in a specific program.
P
The article must be used only in a properly designed programme.
PA
Article must be used only in a properly designed programme, need a more detailed description.
PCME
Article only for a properly designed Programme, it may imply a Medical risk if misused, Expensive.
PE
Article must be used only in a properly designed programme, Expensive, cheaper alternatives exist.
PF
The article must be used only in a properly designed programme + monitor the use, efficacy.
PM
Article must be used only in a properly designed programme, it may imply a medical risk if misused.
PME
Article only for a properly designed Programme, it may imply a Medical risk if misused, Expensive.
S
Second choice. Article must only be used if the first choice is not available or cannot be used in a specific context.
SM

Second choice & medical risk. Article must be only used if the first choice is not available or cannot be used in a specific context. The article may imply medical risks if misused by persons with insufficient training or knowledge.
SP

Second Choice & specific programme. The article must only be used if the first choice. is not available or cannot be used in a specific context. The article must be used only in a properly designed programme.
